mapper.sql: id, version, bitState, realName, idNumber, phoneNumber, incomeGrade_id, marriage_id, authScore, realauthId, email, kidCount_id, educationBackground_id, houseCondition_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo ( id, version, bitState, realName, authScore, email, idNumber, phoneNumber, incomeGrade_id, marriage_id, kidCount_id, educationBackground_id, houseCondition_id) VALUES (#{id},0, #{bitState}, #{realName}, #{authScore},#{email},#{idNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{incomeGrade.id}, #{marriage.id}, #{kidCount.id}, #{educationBackground.id}, #{houseCondition.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET version = version + 1, bitState = #{bitState}, realName = #{realName}, idNumber = #{idNumber}, authScore = #{authScore}, email = #{email}, realauthId = #{realauthId}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, incomeGrade_id = #{incomeGrade.id}, marriage_id = #{marriage.id}, kidCount_id = #{kidCount.id}, educationBackground_id = #{educationBackground.id}, houseCondition_id = #{houseCondition.id} WHERE id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM userinfo WHERE id = #{id} and version = #{version}
